OOC: Please put Sideswipe on the Deceased list Zardus

::Torca, Bluestreak and Ratchet are getting worried about Sideswipe, so they 
set out to find him::
Bluestreak: I smell Sideswipe's scent.
::They follow the scent trail until they come to the Deathcon::
Ratchet: Whoa, talk about your pile of junk.
Torca: The scent stops here.
::Torca sees a bit of fur on the ground.  It is thoroughly scorched::
Torca: No.
Ratchet: What's wrong Torca?
Torca: Were too late.  Sideswipe has breathed his last.
::A look of horror is on Bluestreaks face::
Bluestreak: You shall be avenged, Sideswipe, as soon as I find out who killed 
you.
Ratchet: I imagine the bot were looking for is in there
::He points to the Deathcon::
Torca: We can't get fight in there by our selves.
Ratchet: I say we go back and get help
::They walk back to the Maximal base::
